channel.title: Need a DarkThrone script [Probably VERY HARD]
channel.description:
Anyone know how to make a Dark Throne auto-attacker? I've been trying to find one for some time and I haven't been able to.
What I need it to do [you don't need to have them all] : auto banker auto upgrader attack until it is stopped or runs out of attacks scroll down the list attacking everyone with an adjustable amount of turns be undetectible
Thanks in advance :D

item.title: Need a DarkThrone script [Probably VERY HARD]
item.dc:creator: @warlockPT warlockPT
item.description:
@warlockPT wrote:

I’m also needing one (or at least some pointers on developing one by myself)… any helpers ?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a DarkThrone script [Probably VERY HARD]

item.description:
@Knyfer wrote:

Anyone know how to make a Dark Throne auto-attacker? I’ve been trying to find one for some time and I haven’t been able to.

What I need it to do [you don’t need to have them all] :
auto banker
auto upgrader
attack until it is stopped or runs out of attacks
scroll down the list attacking everyone with an adjustable amount of turns
be undetectible
